name: Frisky Business
description: You are Mr. Falco Frisk, private detective of Frisk Investigative Solutions! Develop your relationships with your team as you take on your very first case. Dive into a sexy and strange adventure of hot babes and killer clowns!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP2)+ Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
